com.framelibrary.util.eyes

类 SystemBarTintManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.framelibrary.util.eyes.SystemBarTintManager

  • public class SystemBarTintManager
extends java.lang.Object
    作用是沉浸式通知栏的一个管理类

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  SystemBarTintManager.SystemBarConfig
      Class which describes system bar sizing and other characteristics for the current device configuration.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SystemBarTintManager

        public SystemBarTintManager(AppCompatActivity activity)
        Constructor. Call this in the host libActivity onCreate method after its content view has been set. You should always create new instances when the host libActivity is recreated.
        参数:
        activity - The host libActivity.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setStatusBarTintEnabled

        public void setStatusBarTintEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable tinting of the system status bar. If the platform is running Jelly Bean or earlier, or translucent system UI modes have not been enabled in either the theme or via window flags, then this method does nothing.
        参数:
        enabled - True to enable tinting, false to disable it (default).

      • setNavigationBarTintEnabled

        public void setNavigationBarTintEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable tinting of the system navigation bar. If the platform does not have soft navigation keys, is running Jelly Bean or earlier, or translucent system UI modes have not been enabled in either the theme or via window flags, then this method does nothing.
        参数:
        enabled - True to enable tinting, false to disable it (default).

      • setTintColor

        public void setTintColor(int color)
        Apply the specified color tint to all system UI bars.
        参数:
        color - The color of the background tint.

      • setTintResource

        public void setTintResource(int res)
        Apply the specified drawable or color resource to all system UI bars.
        参数:
        res - The identifier of the resource.

      • setTintDrawable

        public void setTintDrawable(Drawable drawable)
        Apply the specified drawable to all system UI bars.
        参数:
        drawable - The drawable to use as the background, or null to remove it.

      • setTintAlpha

        public void setTintAlpha(float alpha)
        Apply the specified alpha to all system UI bars.
        参数:
        alpha - The alpha to use

      • setStatusBarTintColor

        public void setStatusBarTintColor(int color)
        Apply the specified color tint to the system status bar.
        参数:
        color - The color of the background tint.

      • setStatusBarTintResource

        public void setStatusBarTintResource(int res)
        Apply the specified drawable or color resource to the system status bar.
        参数:
        res - The identifier of the resource.

        参数:

      • getConfig

        public SystemBarTintManager.SystemBarConfig getConfig()
        Get the system bar configuration.
        返回:
        The system bar configuration for the current device configuration.

      • isStatusBarTintEnabled

        public boolean isStatusBarTintEnabled()
        Is tinting enabled for the system status bar?
        返回:
        True if enabled, False otherwise.

      • isNavBarTintEnabled

        public boolean isNavBarTintEnabled()
        Is tinting enabled for the system navigation bar?
        返回:
        True if enabled, False otherwise.
